name: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Birth of the Federation
name_original: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Birth of the Federation
description:
Star Trek: The Next Generation - Birth of the Federation is a strategy game developed by MicroProse Software. It was originally released in 1999. Hasbro Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Star Trek: The Next Generation - Birth of the Federation on PC.
